8190.title: The service will resist legal requests for user information where reasonably possible

tosdr.case: The service will resist legal requests for user information where reasonably possible
tosdr.tldr: The privacy policy states "We won’t track you or use any tracking service (third-party or not) to save/collect your information. We don’t have a logging policy which means even usual logs (such as IP addresses) won’t be saved on our end or on the cloud.".

8191.title: You are allowed to quote their content with attribution

tosdr.case: You are allowed to quote their content with attribution
tosdr.tldr: The copyright notice states "Unless otherwise noted, texts and notes are published under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) license.".

8192.title: The terms for this service are easy to read

tosdr.case: The terms for this service are easy to read
tosdr.tldr: It's written very simple and short.

8193.title: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

tosdr.case: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
tosdr.tldr:
The service states "We may update this policies from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting new policies on this page.

You are advised to review this legal page periodically for any changes. Changes to this page are effective when they are posted on this page or at the time set on top of this page.".
The service doesn't asks for personal information and they don't have a registration system.

tosdr.case: Only necessary user logs are kept by the service to ensure quality
tosdr.tldr: The service states "We won’t track you or use any tracking service (third-party or not) to save/collect your information. We don’t have a logging policy which means even usual logs (such as IP addresses) won’t be saved on our end or on the cloud.".
